name: Exchange
description: This contract provides a helper exchange abstraction to be used by other contracts, so that it can be replaced to accomodate routing changes.

eventDecorators.name: AnnounceDelayedAction
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: ChangeOracle
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: ChangeRouter
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: ChangeTreasury
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: ExecuteDelayedAction
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

functionDecorators.name: calcConversionFromInput
functionDecorators.description: Calculates how much output to be received from the given input when converting between two assets.

parameterDecorators.name: _inputAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The input asset amount to be provided.

returnDecorators.name: _outputAmount
returnDecorators.description: The output asset amount to be received.

functionDecorators.name: calcConversionFromOutput
functionDecorators.description: Calculates how much input to be received the given the output when converting between two assets.

parameterDecorators.name: _outputAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The output asset amount to be received.

returnDecorators.name: _inputAmount
returnDecorators.description: The input asset amount to be provided.

functionDecorators.name: calcJoinPoolFromInput
functionDecorators.description: Estimates the number of LP shares to be received by a single asset deposit into a liquidity pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The ERC-20 token for the asset being deposited.

returnDecorators.name: _outputShares
returnDecorators.description: The expected number of LP shares to be received.

functionDecorators.name: convertFundsFromInput
functionDecorators.description: Convert funds between two assets given the exact input amount.

parameterDecorators.name: _inputAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The input asset amount to be provided.

parameterDecorators.name: _minOutputAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The output asset minimum amount to be received.

functionDecorators.name: convertFundsFromOutput
functionDecorators.description: Convert funds between two assets given the exact output amount.

parameterDecorators.name: _outputAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The output asset amount to be received.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxInputAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The input asset maximum amount to be provided.

functionDecorators.name: joinPoolFromInput
functionDecorators.description: Deposits a single asset into a liquidity pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The ERC-20 token for the asset being deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: _minOutputShares
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum number of LP shares to be received.

returnDecorators.name: _outputShares
returnDecorators.description: The actual number of LP shares received.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: recoverLostFunds
functionDecorators.description: Allows the recovery of tokens sent by mistake to this contract, excluding tokens relevant to its operations. The full balance is sent to the treasury address. This is a privileged function.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to be recovered.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setOracle
functionDecorators.description: Updates the Uniswap V2 compatible oracle address. This is a privileged function.

functionDecorators.name: setRouter
functionDecorators.description: Updates the Uniswap V2 compatible router address. This is a privileged function.

functionDecorators.name: setTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Updates the treasury address used to recover lost funds. This is a privileged function.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
